ValidationRule.description: SE-2020 - The requirement to have a proper error message for US users when the patient name is left blank on SQD and SQ6 work orders as they were getting a generic error message.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
NOT( $Setup.HRCFSL_Org_Exception_Rule__c.HRCFSL_Validation_Rule__c )
&&
Location.HRCSVC_Region__c <> "Europe"
&&
OR( ISBLANK( HRCFSL_Patient_First_Name__c ) , ISBLANK( HRCFSL_Patient_Last_Name__c ) )
&&
OR( HRCFSL_Work_Type_Name__c = "SQD", HRCFSL_Work_Type_Name__c = "SQ6")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the patient's first name and last name
